pullRequest.body:
This is an attempt to make #3838 universe polymorphic

---

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

using the following format:

- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]
-->

* Depends on #6271
* Depends on #8876

nodes.body: I would prefer to revert the universe polymorphism from #5796 rather than leave this in limbo. Certainly not urgent, but I don't want to just forget about this problem.

Could something be done about this? I would be sad if this unnecessary universe polymorphism change permanently prevents us from using MetaM in slim_check.

I would like to either see this PR made to work, or the universe polymorphism change reverted.

**[lint-style]** reported by [reviewdog](https://github.com/reviewdog/reviewdog) :dog:
```suggestion {m : Type u Type v} {m : Type u Type v} {m : Type (max u u) Type v} ```

**[lint-style]** reported by [reviewdog](https://github.com/reviewdog/reviewdog) :dog:
```suggestion TestResult p Nat Rand MetaM (TestResult p) ```

**[lint-style]** reported by [reviewdog](https://github.com/reviewdog/reviewdog) :dog:
```suggestion TestResult p Nat RandT MetaM (TestResult p) ```

**[lint-style]** reported by [reviewdog](https://github.com/reviewdog/reviewdog) :dog:
```suggestion {m : Type u Type v} {m : Type u Type v} {m : Type (max u u) Type v} ```

source.title: Revert "fix: correct universe polymorphism in SlimCheck (#5796)"
